title: Random Header Image
supportImageSize: Only Unsplash and Picsum support image size settings
readFromAssets: Randomly read files from assets directory
writeToAssets: Save random header image to assets directory
assetsLocationDesc: This configuration is the path under the workspace/data directory, e.g.: /assets, /public, etc.
readAssetsError: Assets directory loading failed, please check configuration or console error messages
emptyAssets: Directory is empty or does not exist
